mapper.sql: UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN
mapper.select: select o.uuid,date_format(o.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime, date_format(o.checktime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as checktime, date_format(o.starttime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as starttime, date_format(o.endtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endtime, o.type,u1.name as creatername, u2.name as checkername,u3.name as startername,u4.name as endername, s1.name as suppliername,o.totalmoney, o.state,o.waybillsn from orders o inner join sys_emp u1 on o.creater=u1.uuid left join sys_emp as u2 on o.checker =u2.uuid left join sys_emp u3 on o.starter=u3.uuid left join sys_emp u4 on o.ender=u4.uuid left join supplier s1 on o.supplieruuid=s1.uuid
mapper.insert: insert into orders (UUID, CREATETIME, CHECKTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, TYPE, CREATER, CHECKER, STARTER, ENDER, SUPPLIERUUID, TOTALMONEY, STATE, WAYBILLSN) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into orders
CREATETIME,
CHECKTIME,
STARTTIME,
ENDTIME,
TYPE,
CREATER,
CHECKER,
STARTER,
ENDER,
SUPPLIERUUID,
TOTALMONEY,
STATE,
WAYBILLSN,
#{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{checktime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{totalmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update orders
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE},
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STARTER = #{starter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENDER = #{ender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUPPLIERUUID = #{supplieruuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTALMONEY = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, WAYBILLSN = #{waybillsn,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
